mapper.select: select id, cbTitle, cbContent, nickName, cbTel, cbEmail, register, institution, dept, staff, aswTitle, aswContent, regDate, editDate from customerboard where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customerboard (cbTitle, cbContent, nickName, cbTel, cbEmail, register, institution, dept, staff, aswTitle, aswContent, regDate) VALUES (#{cbTitle}, #{cbContent}, #{nickName}, #{cbTel}, #{cbEmail}, #{register}, #{institution}, #{dept}, #{staff}, #{aswTitle}, #{aswContent}, #{regDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE customerboard SET cbTitle=#{cbTitle}, cbContent=#{cbContent}, nickName=#{nickName}, cbTel=#{cbTel}, cbEmail=#{cbEmail}, register=#{register}, institution=#{institution}, dept=#{dept} ,staff=#{staff}, aswTitle=#{aswTitle}, aswContent=#{aswContent}, editDate=#{editDate} WHERE id=#{id};
